h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Getting hit by even a few of these will quickly deplete your healthbar, and you’ll have to stop everything to focus on evasion. While it is possible to get on top of your staff in the Pillar Stance, each electric ring will take a chunk out of your stamina, and this segment lasts far too long to wait out in this style.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Getting hit by even a few of these will quickly deplete your healthbar, and you’ll have to stop everything to focus on evasion. While it is possible to get on top of your staff in the Pillar Stance, each electric ring will take a chunk out of your stamina, and this segment lasts far too long to wait out in this style.
